_header: If any person steal this book

BLHar45.Transcription:
If ony persone stele þis bokehe shalbe hongyd by a
                    hoke
BLHar45.Note:
Written in rubric to right of end of owner’s inscription below
                        3720; another hand writing in black ink adds
                    after the end, ‘or by the necke with a rope’.
BLHar45.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.163.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 256.
